title: Coronavirus: Spain PM sees 'fire coming under control'
title_page: Coronavirus: Spain PM sees 'fire coming under control' - BBC News
maintext: "You know that I don't believe we should have common debt because of the situation of our political union and that's why we reject this... but there are so many ways to show solidarity and I believe we will find a good solution," she said.
